VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 08 Associate Consultant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 12:01 IST
 V.O Chidambaranar Port Trust
 8 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 30,000 to 50,000




FOLLOW

The V.O. Chidambaranar Port Trust (VOC Port Trust) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 08 Associate Consultant, Professional Intern Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBA, CA, and PGDM can apply for the VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Associate Consultant	04	MBA, CA
Professional Intern	04	MBA, PGDM

VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 40 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Skill Test.
Interview.

VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 30,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 50,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the VOC Port Trust Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form at the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

The Secretary, V.O. Chidambaranar Port Authority, Tuticorn, 628004.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	20-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
